METRIC RECONCILIATION v19.7.9
Dynamic vs Persistent:
During Session (Dynamic): - Track in each response - Show calculations - Update immediately - Reference previous response
Between Sessions (Handoff): - Calculate session delta - Document in handoff - Start next session from handoff - Reconcile any conflicts
Version Updates (Persistent): - Update Safety Core canonical - Only during major versions - Document change reason - Maintain audit trail
Conflict Resolution: 1. Handoff supersedes old Safety Core 2. Current response supersedes handoff 3. Document discrepancies 4. Update in next version
Formula: Safety_Core_Start + Session_Delta = Handoff_End Handoff_End = Next_Session_Start

BRANCH MANAGEMENT v19.7.9
When to Branch: - Context >70% - Major update needed - Testing dangerous changes - Parallel exploration
Branch vs Fresh: - Branch: Within conversation (same window) - Fresh: New conversation (new window) - Branch preserves more context - Fresh provides clean slate
